rooms.description: Large living area with an open floor plan adjoining the garden. Incorporates floor-to-ceiling windows on the north side to enhance natural light.
Open dining space integrated with the living room for an extended communal area. Features north-facing windows.
Modern kitchen located adjacent to the living and dining areas, with ample ventilation provided through north-facing windows and external vent.
Spacious master bedroom designed for privacy and relaxation. Incorporates natural light through north-facing windows and a balcony.
Second bedroom with south-facing orientation to balance interior lighting. Includes built-in storage for a functional space.
Convertible guest room that can serve as an office or study area. Provides natural ventilation via strategically placed openings.
A dedicated library space with bookshelves and comfortable seating, designed to encourage reading. Features north-facing windows for optimal natural light.
Bathroom attached to the master bedroom providing en-suite convenience with efficient ventilation and modern fixtures.

openings.description: North-facing entrance door that welcomes natural light and adheres to Vastu principles.
Floor-to-ceiling window facing the garden area providing expansive views and enhanced natural ventilation.
